text:
Hello children. I am reading a book. Yeah!
Listen, Steve´s coming. Let´s have some

fun.
Hey, hello children. Hi. Hello Maggie.

Hello Steve.
Are you ready to learn English? Yeah! Look

around. What can you see?
Hehey look! What´s this?

A door!
What is it?

Yeah. It´s a door. Say with me. It´s a door.
It´s a door. Come on. It´s a door. Again.

It´s a door. Oh, I am bored. Time for some
Maggie magic! Yeah! Let´s have some fun.

A door. Again. It´s a door. Well done! So,
look around.

Abracadabra!
What else you can see? Oh, hey! Did that window

move? No. Windows can´t move, can they? Oh,
no! Look, it´s a window. So, say with me.

It´s a window. It´s a window.
It´s here. It´s a window. Come on. It´s

a window. Well done!
Maggie: Yeah!

Oh, I must be going crazy. Oh well. What else
can you see? Oh look. What´s Maggie got?

Hey Maggie, what have you got?
A book! Yeah!

Yeah! A book. So say it with me.
Both: It´s a book.

Yeah!
Both: It´s a book.

Come on.
Both: It´s a book.

That´s right.
Maggie: Abracadabra.

It´s a book. It´s a book. It´s a flying
book.

Maggie: Yeah!
Hey! Look, look at the door! Look at the window!

Look at the bag! They´re all moving. Help!
Oh, wait a minute! This is Maggie magic. Maggie,

stop this right now!
Ok. Stop!

Sorry.
Hey! Maggie, was that bag on my head?

Yeah!
Look, it´s a bag.

Yeah.
So let´s finish. Yeah. Say with me.

Both: It´s a bag. It´s a bag. It´s a bag.
Last time.

Both: It´s a bag.
Well done. But Maggie, you´re a naughty naughty
